parameter.name: earliestTime
parameter.description: For scheduled searches display all the scheduled times starting from this time

parameter.name: latestTime
parameter.description: For scheduled searches display all the scheduled times until this time

parameter.name: listDefaultAction
parameter.description: Indicates whether to list default actions

parameter.name: orphanField
parameter.description: Indicates whether response includes a boolean value for each saved search to show whether the search is orphaned, meaning that it has no valid owner
